Description:
Exception is thrown out when open Chart Example View .
 
Build number:
2.2.0.v20061123-0710
 
Steps to reproduce:
1. Top menu Window->Show Views->Others->Chart Example View.
 
Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.
 
Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
